column5: Located on the beautiful Guadalupe River within minutes of Schlitterbahn, downtown New Braunfels, and within 2 miles of Historic Gruene Hall, this is the ideal vacation spot to enjoy beautiful scenery, great Texas music, relaxing river trips and waterpark fun in the sun.  Relax in between everything New Braunfels has to offer at the 2 swimming pools & 4 hot tubs, enjoying the large, lush grill & picnic area, or just kicking back on the balcony of this beautiful, upgraded luxury condo!
column8: Luxury Retreat on Guadalupe River in New Braunfels
